title: Interactive Multimedia Learning Program for Understanding Electrochemistry

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational chemistry knowledge (atomic structure, chemical equations, etc.)
context.additional_context: Modular design optimized for smartphone-based learning, incorporating work-integrated case studies for professionals

learning_goals: One can comprehensively explain oxidation-reduction reactions occurring in electrochemical cells at macroscopic, microscopic, and symbolic levels.
One can analyze real-time simulations of electrochemical phenomena and predict experimental results using IMMPA.
Learners can solve calculation problems related to electrolysis and cell reactions with over 80% accuracy through step-by-step guidance provided by a pedagogical agent.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
